bibl.title: Village Pet Store And Charcoal Grill
bibl.ref: Article That Supplied Information for Markup

desc.p: Banksy opens his first exhibition in New York, “The Village Pet Store and Charcoal Grill”. It features mainly animatronics. Almost all of the content is used the following year in the “Banksy vs Bristol Museum”, Banksy’s biggest exhibition so far.
